column4: anyone know why sounds doesn't work in my browser?  it works normal on any other app.. but not browser
are you trying to play two sounds at once(like say, an mp3, and a flash video?)
i bet you're dealing w/ pulse audio issues...  i had a similar prob, couldn't play two sounds at once, if i got an IM the "receive" tone, woudl cause me to lose sound in flash.
i switched all my apps to alsa, set all my outputs to alsa, and everything has been fine since.
